title: Are you really aware that you are a spiritual Being? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, we must become aware that we exist, physically. We are physical beings. The body is real; the body is the only real thing in our lives, everything else is imaginary. Where is your attention? Right now, you are reading these words, perhaps agreeing, perhaps disagreeing, but your attention is not on your body; you do not know you exist physically. Until you feel you exist physically, you are just a dreamer.
Please define spiritual being. Things spiritual, belong to each one's mind, they're not related with the real life. It's just our very powerful brains working.
